title: Trump Commands Venezuela’s Heavens Closed
description: US President Trump ordered the airspace above and surrounding Venezuela “closed in its entirety” on November 29. Yet the US has as much legal and moral authority to shutter the skies over Venezuela as the Venezuelans have to close the putting greens at Mar-a-…
content:
Photograph Source: Sgt. Ori Shifrin – CC BY 2.0
US President Trump ordered the airspace above and surrounding Venezuela closed in its entirety on November 29.
